p: Our results also have bearing on the n3:n6 fatty acid ratio in a personâ€™s total diet, which should be 1:1 or higher for optimum health. All diets yielded a n3:n6 ratio close to 1 in tilapia fillets. Thus, even full replacement of fishmeal with N. oculata co-product (Nanno100 diet) can still maintain a favorable ratio for the human consumer [ 34, 68].
